name: 三国吞天传 幻想姬武神战记
name_original: 三国吞天传 幻想姬武神战记
description:
This game will be dedicated to the familiar stories of the Three Kingdoms. Using traditional RPG gameplay, you will cross levels and conquer cities and territories all the way until the final victory!



Game Features

Except for maze maps such as caves and mountain roads, all big maps are invincible, allowing you to explore the world without any hesitation!

1. All enemies are visible thunder! The game does not force you to encounter enemies, as long as you dodge a little, you can avoid many battles. In addition, you can also use protective cigarettes, smoke escape strategies, etc. to temporarily completely eliminate the enemy!

2. The maze cave design in the game will mainly be linear and simple. Even without a map, it can be easily passed through; Combined with the unique maze indicator function, not only will it prompt the main route, but even some branch lines or secret passages with treasure chests will also prompt, and from then on, I will be at my own mercy in the maze!

3. Elite enemy function that can be turned on and off at any time! If you feel that the battle is not challenging, you can activate the Elite Enemy function at any time. After activating it, the enemy's ability, money, and explosive rate will increase, making it suitable for players who need to challenge. Of course, you can also turn off this feature at any time, and this operation will not affect the game's plot and process at all.

4. Task reminder function! Are you worried because you can't find the plot NPC? Do you feel uneasy playing games while watching the guides? Now that the game comes with a task reminder function, what to do next, where to go, and who to find, the task prompts in the screen are clear at a glance! Ensure that you don't need to read the strategy at all to pass the level smoothly! Of course, if you enjoy exploring the plot yourself, you can also turn off this feature at any time!

5. Up to 9 equipment slots, weapons, various types of armor, jewelry, gems, war horses... let you fully utilize the combination of various equipment!

6. There are three levels of difficulty to choose from at the beginning of the game! The second type is the default normal difficulty level of the game, suitable for most players; The third type is difficulty level, suitable for hardcore players; As for the first simple difficulty, Gaga Shuffle is suitable for players who only want to watch the plot.

7. There are many hidden treasures in the game that are usually invisible, but as long as you hand over a little money to the relevant NPC, all hidden items will flash with prompts. Quickly include all the treasures in your bag!

8. Design without teammate death! As long as the team is not completely destroyed, all teammates who died in battle will automatically revive after the battle, making your exploration journey smoother!

9. Different color NPC name designs, which are enemy NPCs, plot NPCs, and ordinary NPCs can be distinguished by color at a glance!

As the plot deepens, you will recruit many teammates, and each character's abilities, talents, skills, and equipment will vary. Choose your favorite combination to fight!
